step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched fully overhead and your fingers are spread wide.
Your arm extension overhead looks good. Keep the focus on a smooth, controlled movement as you transition.
Excellent! You're making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together effectively. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you return to the starting position.
You're completing the repetitions well. Continue to focus on controlled movements and proper breathing throughout each exercise.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with fingers spread, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax back.
